Class ZCLClusterBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bubblecloud.zigbee.api.cluster.impl.core.ZCLClusterBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ZCLCluster
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlarmsCluster, AnalogInputCluster, BasicCluster, BinaryInputCluster, ColorControlCluster, CommissioningCluster, DeviceTemperatureConfigurationCluster, DoorLockCluster, ElectricalMeasurementCluster, FanControlCluster, FlowMeasurementCluster, GenericTunnelCluster, GroupsCluster, IASACECluster, IASWDCluster, IASZoneCluster, IdentifyCluster, IlluminanceLevelSensingCluster, IlluminanceMeasurementCluster, LevelControlCluster, MeteringCluster, OccupancySensingCluster, OnOffCluster, OnOffSwitchConfigurationCluster, PowerConfigurationCluster, PressureMeasurementCluster, PumpConfigurationAndControlCluster, RelativeHumidityMeasurementCluster, RSSILocationCluster, ScenesCluster, ShadeConfigurationCluster, TemperatureMeasurementCluster, ThermostatCluster, ThermostatUserInterfaceConfigurationCluster, TimeCluster, WindowCoveringCluster

    public abstract class ZCLClusterBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements ZCLCluster
    This is the base implementation for a cluster.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public abstract short getId()
        Description copied from interface: ZCLCluster
        This method return the actual ClusterId. Please remember that the final and official ClusterId
        is defined by the Profile even if the Cluster is defined by a Cluster Library.
        Specified by:
        getId in interface ZCLCluster
        Returns:
        the ClusterId

      • getName

        public abstract java.lang.String getName()
        Specified by:
        getName in interface ZCLCluster
        Returns:
        This method return the String identifying the human readable name of the cluster.
        The name is assigned by the document defining the Cluster, either the Cluster Library or
        or the Profile

      • getStandardAttributes

        public abstract Attribute[] getStandardAttributes()
        Description copied from interface: ZCLCluster
        This method returns an Attribute array containing the Attribute defined by
        the specification of the cluster. Hence, this method returns all Attribute defined
        either as Mandatory or as Optional, but does not return the Attribute
        defined by the Manufacturer.
        Specified by:
        getStandardAttributes in interface ZCLCluster
        Returns:
        The Attribute arrays

        public boolean isDefaultResponseEnabled()
        Specified by:
        isDefaultResponseEnabled in interface ZCLCluster
        Returns:
        true if and only if the Default response command is enabled

      • getAvailableAttributes

        public Attribute[] getAvailableAttributes()
        Description copied from interface: ZCLCluster
        This method returns an Attribute array containing the Attribute that are actually
        implemented on the cluster instance. Hence this method should return even the Attribute
        defined by the Manufacturer.
        Specified by:
        getAvailableAttributes in interface ZCLCluster
        Returns:
        The Attribute arrays

      • getManufacturerId

        public int getManufacturerId()
        Specified by:
        getManufacturerId in interface ZCLCluster
        Returns:
        This method returns -1 if and only if no Manufacturer specific extension
        are implement, otherwise it returns the ManufacturerId
